frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-show-application-view-when-workspace-empty
frozen.shortDescription: Shows the application view when the workspace is or becomes empty, such as switching to an empty workspace, when all windows on a workspace are closed, or after login. Starting applications or switching to a workspace with open windows will hide the overview if it's showing.
frozen.longDescription: Shows the application view when the workspace is or becomes empty, such as switching to an empty workspace, when all windows on a workspace are closed, or after login. Starting applications or switching to a workspace with open windows will hide the overview if it's showing.
